articles.content:
A charity led by a black woman who was repeatedly asked where she was "really" from at a royal event has temporarily stopped its work over safety.
Sistah Space was thrown into the spotlight when its… [+2382 chars]

articles.author: Charlotte Higgins
articles.title: ‘People wouldn’t show my work – or even reply to me’: Veronica Ryan on her Turner prize triumph - The Guardian
articles.description: The oldest artist ever to win the Turner spent years feeling as if she was invisible. Now, her quiet, contemplative sculptures have finally been rewarded with the British art world’s biggest prize
articles.content: Its the morning after Veronica Ryan won the Turner prize, a moment celebrated with her name being projected triumphantly on Liverpools vast Radio City tower, and it still hasnt sunk in. It feels as t… [+8411 chars]
